div.p: The simulated number of years for one generation of Popillia japonica to complete development in Japan (threshold 10Â°C and 1,422 egg-to-egg degree-days) under current climatic conditions (A) and future climate projections under CNRM-CM5 (B) and ACCESS1-0 (C) general circulation models running the representative concentration pathway (RCP) 8.5 emission scenario for 2050.
